definitions.definition: A foolish or silly person or animal.
examples: If that goofball would put half the effort into her studies as she does into her juggling, she might do very well.

definitions.definition: A pill or tablet containing a pharmaceutical which has hypnotic or intoxicating effects, especially a barbiturate .

main_definition: ( informal , often derogatory , sometimes endearing ) A foolish or silly person or animal.
secondary_definitions: ( informal , pharmacology ) A pill or tablet containing a pharmaceutical which has hypnotic or intoxicating effects, especially a barbiturate .
